name: Klaystar_Demo
description:
Klaystar is a 2D precision platformer, where the player controls Klay, a talented boy with the ability to turn into a bouncy ball, along with his friend Malo.

Set on a massive pillar connecting the earth and the sky, the ever-shifting world of Klaystar is filled with a myriad of unique and strange phenomena. Klaystar features eight chapters, each with their own story, unique mechanics, and collectibles.

So experience the mysteriously wonderful world of the Pillar, as you follow two boys seeking to join the honorable Vanguard, an organization hellbent on exploring the eccentric world they find themselves in.
